MMPDownloadLibrary
==================

An iOS library that can be used for batch file downloading.

Currently two versions available for this library:

Version 1.0
===========
Basic file downloading.

**Usage:**

```
NSMutableArray *asset = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];

// Creating and filling the download helper (Saving to document directory - default path)
MMPDownloadHelper *helper = [[MMPDownloadHelper alloc] init];
helper.assetName          = @"Midhun.png";
helper.assetURL           = [NSURL URLWithString:@"data:image/jpeg;base64,"];
    
[asset addObject:helper];
    
// Creating and filling the download helper (Specifying custom folder)
helper = [[MMPDownloadHelper alloc] init];
helper.assetName = @"Midhun.jpg";
helper.assetURL = [NSURL URLWithString:@"http://m.c.lnkd.licdn.com/mpr/pub/image-7OweDJda47gqMRovFu8fn5mUEKeA68sP7bwrnawYEiVF6NP_7OwrUDMaE17aykAq8QWh/midhun-m-p.jpg"];
helper.assetFolder = @"My Photos";
[asset addObject:helper];
    
// Creating download Manager instance and downloading the files
MMPDownloadManager *manager = [[MMPDownloadManager alloc] init];
[manager setAssetsToDownload:asset];
[manager setDownloadView:self.view];
[manager downloadAssets];
```


Version 2.0
===========
File downloading with delegates.


### Delegates

**Required:**

Specifies the number of assets need to be downloaded.

`- (NSInteger)numberOfAssetstoDownload`

Specifies the download asset and it's properties

`- (MMPDownloadHelper *)assetForDownloading:(NSInteger)index`

**Optional:**

Called when a download successfully completes

`- (void)downloadSuccessFullForAsset:(MMPDownloadHelper *)as`

Called when a download fails

`- (void)downloadFailedWithError:(NSError *)error forAsset:(MMPDownloadHelper *)as`

**Usage:**

```
NSMutableArray *asset = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];

// Creating and filling the download helper (Saving to document directory - default path)
MMPDownloadHelper *helper = [[MMPDownloadHelper alloc] init];
helper.assetName          = @"Midhun.png";
helper.assetURL           = [NSURL URLWithString:@"data:image/jpeg;base64,"];
    
[asset addObject:helper];
    
// Creating and filling the download helper (Specifying custom folder)
helper = [[MMPDownloadHelper alloc] init];
helper.assetName = @"Midhun.jpg";
helper.assetURL = [NSURL URLWithString:@"http://m.c.lnkd.licdn.com/mpr/pub/image-7OweDJda47gqMRovFu8fn5mUEKeA68sP7bwrnawYEiVF6NP_7OwrUDMaE17aykAq8QWh/midhun-m-p.jpg"];
helper.assetFolder = @"My Photos";
[asset addObject:helper];

// Creating download manager object and specifying the delegate class
MMPDownloadManager *manager = [[MMPDownloadManager alloc] init];
[manager setDelegate:self];
[manager setDownloadView:self.view];
[manager downloadAssets];
    
#pragma mark - Delegates

- (NSInteger)numberOfAssetstoDownload
{
    return [asset count];
}

- (MMPDownloadHelper *)assetForDownloading:(NSInteger)index
{
    return [asset objectAtIndex:index];
}

- (void)downloadSuccessFullForAsset:(MMPDownloadHelper *)as
{
    NSLog(@"%@",as.assetName);
}

- (void)downloadFailedWithError:(NSError *)error forAsset:(MMPDownloadHelper *)as
{
    NSLog(@"%@->%@",as.assetName,[[error userInfo] objectForKey:@"Reason"]);
}

```
